string.text:
An AR-15 rifle scaled up to shoot larger cartridges, 60% of the SR-25's parts are interchangeable with AR-15 components. Selling well among civilian shooters who needed an accurate semi-automatic rifle for hunting or target shooting, this rifle also found use within the United State Military. The SR-25 provides military-robust construction and efficient performance, whether engaging close or long-range targets.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Knight's Armament Company

Intended for professional and amateur hunting, the TOZ-34 is an over/under double-barreled shotgun that acquired the state quality mark of the USSR. It is heavy, dependable and packs a punch. This peculiar TOZ-34 was modified to support larger rounds.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]USSR
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Tulsky Oruzheiny Zavod

Intended for professional and amateur hunting, the TOZ-34 is an over/under double-barreled shotgun that acquired the state quality mark of the USSR. It is heavy, dependable and packs a punch. This peculiar TOZ-34 was modified to support larger rounds and features a red dot sight.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]USSR
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Tulsky Oruzheiny Zavod
